short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly request publications for diverse business models beyond subscriptions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For individuals seeking access to premium content from esteemed publications without committing to multiple subscriptions, this app offers a solution. With this extension, users can inform publications of their interest in accessing content without a subscription, instead opting to pay a nominal fee. 'I Wish to Read' is a public service provided by Paperview Systems.
